about.title: About
about.subtitle: Creative developer crafting beautiful digital experiences
about.description1: As a passionate Computer Engineering graduate with 3+ years of hands-on experience at P.I Works, I've dedicated my career to crafting robust backend solutions that power real-world applications. My expertise spans modern technologies including C#, .NET Core, Java, Spring Boot, and microservices architecture, with recent focus on full-stack development using Next.js, TypeScript, and mobile development with Expo and React Native.
about.description2: What drives me is the challenge of solving intricate problems through clean, maintainable code. I thrive in collaborative environments where I can contribute to meaningful projects while continuously expanding my technical horizons. My commitment to best practices, combined with a growth mindset, makes me a valuable asset to any development team looking to build exceptional software solutions.

cleanCode.title: Clean Code
cleanCode.description: Writing maintainable, scalable code following OOP and SOLID principles.

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: Building high-performance backend systems and distributed applications.

fullStack.title: Full-Stack
fullStack.description: Experience in both backend (.NET, Spring) and frontend (Angular, React) development.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: Working effectively in Agile teams with CI/CD and modern development practices.

experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: My professional journey
experience.description: My professional journey in software development.

descriptions.juniorDeveloper: Contributed actively to both backend and frontend development within an Agile team, focusing on AI-driven mobile network solutions. Developed robust backend applications using C# and .NET Core/ASP.NET Core, managed large-scale databases (Oracle, PostgreSQL), and built user interfaces using Angular and AngularJS. Applied Microservices and Microfrontend architectures while managing CI/CD and deployment with Docker and Kubernetes.
descriptions.intern: Gained practical experience in full-stack web application development and system migration. Involved in web application development using ASP.NET Core, Angular, NHibernate, and Kubernetes. Migrated a legacy WPF application to a .NET Framework web application, enabling multi-platform use for customers.

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: My technical skills and expertise areas

springDistributed.title: Spring Distributed Systems
springDistributed.description: Movie Rating System implementation with Distributed Systems using Spring framework, RabbitMQ for messaging, and Redis for caching. Containerized with Docker. Applied Agile methodology and involved in all SDLC phases.

javaDistributed.title: Java Distributed Systems
javaDistributed.description: Movie Rating System with distributed architecture using Java/J2EE, RESTful APIs, and MySQL. Implements OOP principles, design patterns, and includes DAO pattern with abstract classes and interfaces.

djangoMovie.title: Django Movie Rating System
djangoMovie.description: Backend section of a movie rating website built with Django. Implements MVT architecture, RESTful APIs, and automated functional testing. Uses MySQL database with Django ORM.

easyRetrospective.title: Easy Retrospective
easyRetrospective.description: Retro tool backend application for agile teams to conduct retrospective meetings. Built with Python and modern backend practices.

education.graduationDescription: Graduated with focus on software engineering, algorithms, and distributed systems.
